javax.jdo.spi

Interface RegisterClassListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener

    public interface RegisterClassListener
extends EventListener
    A "RegisterClassEvent" event gets fired whenever a persistence-capable class is loaded and gets registered with the JDOImplHelper. You can register a RegisterClassListener so as to be notified of any registration of a persistence-capable class.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerClass(RegisterClassEvent event)
      This method gets called when a persistence-capable class is registered.

    • Method Detail

      • registerClass

        void registerClass(RegisterClassEvent event)
        This method gets called when a persistence-capable class is registered.
        Parameters:
        event - a RegisterClassEvent instance describing the registered class plus metadata.
